bio: I am a software engineer with expertise in full-stack development.
I am passionate about creating robust and scalable applications.
Currently working with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern web technologies.
interests: I'm very curious and have many interests beyond software development.
I'm passionate about blockchain technology and NFTs.
In the future, I'd like to develop projects on Ethereum and TON networks.
I'm a music enthusiast, particularly enjoying black culture, from rap to jazz and R&B.
I also enjoy watching TV series, with Mr. Robot being my favorite.
I'm a big fan of podcasts and created one with friends called 'Coding Stories'.

projects.name: JustEat Clone
projects.description: A food delivery platform clone with full ordering capabilities.
projects.longDescription: As the first project of my development course, I created a clone of the JustEat food delivery platform. This project showcases my skills in UI/UX design, front-end development, and responsive design principles.

projects.name: RTFKT Clone
projects.description: A clone of the RTFKT website with responsive design and animations.
projects.longDescription: For my second project, I replicated the RTFKT.com website. This project involved more complex CSS animations, responsive layouts for both desktop and mobile, and interactive elements.

projects.name: Alpha Spy
projects.description: A Discord bot that shares messages between Discord servers.
projects.longDescription: Alpha Spy is a personal project different from previous ones. Working in a team, we created a Discord bot that shares messages between Discord servers. Being passionate about NFTs and blockchain, I found it challenging to stay updated on multiple projects. This bot allowed me to receive all news on a single server.
